pullRequest.title: DB-9575 Remove forced regionLocation refresh from AbstractSMInputFormat.getSplits

commit.message: DB-9575 typo in error message fixed
DB-9575 old unit tests fixed, new added

nodes.bodyText: Can you add a check for the scan start/stop keys? Making sure there's no gap between the scan start key and the first split, or between the last split and the scan stop key. This check should also be made when there's only one split.
Do we ever get something other than SMSplit? Is it just defensive programming?

commit.message: DB-9575 more tests and improved check for split gaps

nodes.bodyText:
This check is not correct, we can have a scan with start key = 1000 and the first partition might have key = 500.
We have to check that firstSplit.split.getStartRow() <= scanStartRow and that lastSplit.split.getEndRow() >= scanStopRow (or lastSplit.split.getEndRow().isEmpty())

commit.message: DB-9575 first/last split condition is fixed
